Articles.Content:
Kethane Refine Colony-

The Goal: Make a kethane mining station on another celestial body with a kethane storage/refueling station in orbit around the planet or moon.

Rules:

You can use mods other than Kethane but you will be put on the "modded" leaderboard. Mods not allowed: Hyperedit.

Colony must be able to mine and refine Kethane.

If you make a space station around the body which your Kethane mining colony is on, it must be able to refine Kethane and store fuel.

Colony must consist of at least 5 modules and 7 Kerbals

Space station must consist of at least 4 modules and 5 Kerbals

Must provide screenshot proof (cant have videos internet is too bad)

Scoring:

-10 points if you use Mechjeb although it is allowed

+10 points for colony on Mun

+15 points for colony on Minmus

+40 points for colony on Ike

+45 points for colony on Duna

+50 points for colony on Eve

+55 points for colony on Gilly

+65 points for colony on Moho

+70 points for colony on Dres

+80 points for colony on Laythe

+80 points for colony on Pol

+80 points for colony on Val

+80 points for colony on Bop

+90 points for colony on Tylo

+25 points for space station consisting of at least 4 modules and 5 kerbals. Each other module adds 10 points

+5 points for every Kerbal on the station or colony that you do not need to have.

+10 points for every module on the colony that you do not have to have (5)

Leaderboard (stock other than Kethane)

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Leaderboard (modded)

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Have fun, and tell me if I need to change anything.

BTW I will post my entry when I'm done

Edited April 20, 2014 by Fireking883
